Atlanta.Sylvan Hills, Atlanta:
Sylvan Hills is a neighborhood in southwest Atlanta, Georgia.


== Boundaries ==
The neighborhood is bordered on the north by Deckner Avenue, on the south by Langford Parkway (Hwy 166), to the east by Metropolitan Parkway and on the west by Murphy Avenue.
The area that is now Sylvan Hills was once part of the Perkerson and Gilbert holdings that are believed to date to 1831.
